website_summaries.verdict: For those who seek a sturdier chip for dipping, the ridged Popchips are very resistant to breakage.
pros: The ridged design holds up well to dips or salsa
The tangy BBQ flavor brings a little more heat to the mix, but the plain sea salt is also flavorful without being overly salty
cons: Some may not care for the harder crunch of a ridged chip
The BBQ flavor kicks the heat level to at least medium

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is good but as you can see in the picture they are a total rip off. Only a few chips in each bag. This was such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Young

customer_reviews.title: A Popchips Addict says *YUM*
customer_reviews.text: I am a Popchips addict, so it was only natural for me to order the Ridges variety pack to see how they compare to the original. They were definitely worth the wait. Just as delicious as original Popchips. Unlike the other reviewer, my flavors were evenly matched. Chili Cheese was my favorite (would love to see this flavor in original Popchips, too), but they are all very tasty and equally satisfying. For those of you who aren't keen on the texture of original Popchips as compared to regular chips, these Ridges mimic other ridged chips more closely in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sarges

customer_reviews.title: Great for weight watchers followers
customer_reviews.text: At only 3SP a bag, these are a great choice - and individually packaged keeps you honest and accountable in an easy way. I LOVE the plain popchips but the ridges are even tastier; love the texture. And so reasonably priced by the each. Will definitely order more when I get low.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Lyn

customer_reviews.title: 3 great flavors, 1 that's too much
customer_reviews.text: These are ridiculously delicious and the only thing I bother to have on Subscribe and Save anymore. I love the thick, ridged chips that fill you up without a whole lot of calorie guilt. The best flavor is the Cheddar & Sour Cream, followed by BBQ and the plain Sea Salt. The one flavor I can't eat is the Buffalo Ranch. I'm a baby when it comes to spicy food and these chips are pretty bad. The dude lives off of Sriracha and hot sauces and he likes them but said he can't find the Ranch in them. If I could find a variety box without this flavor, I'd definitely buy it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Chocula

customer_reviews.title: "Unpopped" Popchips
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have purchased Popchips before and they were nothing like the ones we received. These had discolored and hard, "unpopped" portions that made them difficult to chew. Will not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Tasty crunchy never enough These chips are the best flavor I have had in a long time. Too bad i can only find it here or at a price club. 6/2/17 11:12 PM - I am hopelessly addicted to these chips. 6/20/17 12:18 PM-There is no hope for me to resist these fantastic chips. 7/2/17 Another shipment received and being consumed.
customer_reviews.author: ShinMadman3rd

customer_reviews.title: Low Calories, plus the entire family loves them!
customer_reviews.text: These are really good and the entire bag is 100 calories! My husband loved them too. I needed a low calorie snack that felt like when I was reducing calories all the fun wasn't gone from my world (I'm not a chip eater usually because of how greasy they are, but these are not greasy, the perfect chip!). I have now also tried the non-ridged ones - really tasty in every variety was have tried!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn M.

customer_reviews.title: Love these chips
customer_reviews.text: I am a weight watcher member and was looking for something that would compare to the weight watcher pop chips in points because I needed a change. I read the reviews on the rigid chips and they are somewhat mixed. But for me they are very good and I prefer them over the regular pop chips. I like the crunchy factor and also rigid helps ease of scooping use for my zero point Greek yogurt dip.
customer_reviews.author: CatsRGr8

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: These were terrible!!! I will NEVER order them again. We all tried one of each bag, they were just awful! We love Popchips, just not the ridges.
customer_reviews.author: Lady DA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, fresh product
customer_reviews.text: Item as described and in fresh, edible condition. Great price! Box comes with 12 BBQ, 12 Cheddar Sour Cream, 6 Buffalo The only thing I would improve is how to open these bags. There is a slit in the top corner, which forces you to open it vertically on the side instead of from the top like traditional chip bags. I usually cut the top off with scissors instead because I don't like opening it from the side especially when I'm eating these while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: ShopwornAngel

customer_reviews.title: Bag is almost empty. Flavor is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the flavors are very bold and really good. The plastic bags are thick, makes me feel kinda bad for throwing out so much plastic just for a good presentation. The issue is, as others have pointed out. There are literally 10 chips in a bag, if you're lucky. I'd actually feel better if the bag was small, since I'd know what I'm buying. Won't be buying them again, since I feel a bit cheated, as do my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Oof (Insert puke emoji)
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these on July 23rd, 2020. It is September 17th and they are still here. They taste so bad my kids won’t eat them, I definitely won’t eat them. I don’t know if they are no good but the expiration date is for April of next year. It is just the flavor and the after taste. I will continue to offer them to company until I find someone to unload these on. Hate to just throw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: What a joke!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow...what a joke. Image is the side view of a bag. You litterally get a few chips and some crumbs in each bag. These must be factory defect bags. There is no way a company would allow bags like this to be shipped to a paying customer. I would guess that if I were to empty out all the bags into one bowl, I would have less than one bag of regular sized chips. They are tasty though.
customer_reviews.author: Ben R.

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Bad packaging
customer_reviews.text: I love Popchips. This particular flavor is particularly tasty. But the box arrived damaged and the bags themselves were not in good condition. A lot of them were flat while only a few had the full look. Not quite sure what happened to make them like that but it pretty much ruined the bags that were that way. Amazon should have more care about how they package things. Most often, they package things a bit too much. Then they ship things the way I got these chips. Not happy. Bad form, Amazon. Bad form.
customer_reviews.author: iamamerican

customer_reviews.title: Too many plain
customer_reviews.text: The variety pack is great but too many plain (8) and the buffalo ranch are so spicy your lips are numb for a day. Why do they always put double of the plain and only 4 of each of the others except for the barbecue. They are delicious, by the way. They are the first to go, then we put the tangy buffalo out at work so they wouldn’t be wasted, and now are stuck with the cheddar and sour cream which are a bit heavy and 8 sea salt. No one likes the bland sea salt.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma in Grand Rapids

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and a perfect "smart snack" to keep handy
customer_reviews.text: First off, Popchip ridges are one of the best fried potato chip alternative snacks out there. They give you the satisfaction of a salty/savory snack without the guilt or calories. If you want the best value, go with the 30 pack variety pack... much cheaper per serving. Both my wife & I love the Buffalo Ranch flavor, and since the 30 pack only has 6 of that flavor, we needed to switch to all Buffalo Ranch to save our marriage.
customer_reviews.author: pagerage

customer_reviews.title: Hits that salt craving
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty tasty. I was nervous that they would cone smashed since that seemed to be a fairy common review, and my postal service isn’t the worlds best when it comes to not damaging packages, but these came in great shape! I like to eat these when I get a salt craving in the middle of the day. I honestly like the plain salt ones best. I calorie count and these don’t break the calorie bank. Are they healthy? No. Not at all. Are they better then normal chips? Yes they are.
customer_reviews.author: Kuri

customer_reviews.title: 1 chip 2 chip 3 chip 4.... 5 chips and NO MORE!
customer_reviews.text: Trash don’t bother unless you like opening a bag of chips with 4-5 actual chips in it. I felt terrible for all of the packaging waste I produced opening and eating these. Plus to top it all off a few of the bags had broken open during shipment and and spilled all over the entire box. Go to the store and buy a couple big bags that actually have chips in them.
customer_reviews.author: eastcoast jake

customer_reviews.title: STALE ALMOST EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: The box I just received today has a Aug. 2019 date. The ones I bought from Costco over a month ago have a 2020 expire date. Unfortunately the chips taste stale. The chips should not be stale in taste with a couple months left. I wonder if they have been exposed to changing temperatures, that would cause them to go stale.
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: HOLY COW!!! These are GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed something tasty and inexpensive to tide me over until pay day. These were all I could find. I DO NOT like the originals, and was prepared to find these boring and dry. These are anything but. They are rich and wonderfully flavorful. Hurray!!! What a delight. 😇🌷🗽🎵 Update: uh oh, my ONLY problem with these are the buffalo ranch ones...they're so dang hot, I can't eat them. 😢 Glad. there are only six packs of these.
customer_reviews.author: Gem

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: The product listing says this is a package of 72 (0.8 oz.) bags of chips. The first time it shipped, we literally got a single 0.8 oz bag. Tried again, we got 24 (0.8 oz) bags. Not sure what’s up. This is not the description. Not worth the price for sure if you don’t get the amount it states.
customer_reviews.author: Rowds_8

customer_reviews.title: Lacking in flavor and worth
customer_reviews.text: Only the buffalo ranch taste good but there is barely any of that in the pack (6 compared to the 12/each of the other two). The rest taste terrible. Doesn't help that though there are 30 bags, it is filled with 3/4ths air. Each bag had maybe 15 chips each in them. Waste of money, please do not buy this pack or brand.
customer_reviews.author: Guy1

customer_reviews.title: 1 star deduction for buffalo ranch and cheese
customer_reviews.text: the tangy bbq flavor is excellent. 5/5 chip with less calories. better than most normal chips. the other 2 flavors are pretty bad, especially the cheddar cheese, the flavoring is too settle. im not surprised tangy bbq is sold out, it's really good.
customer_reviews.author: getsomesleep

customer_reviews.title: Buffalo Ranch is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sour cream n cheddar and tangy bbq are "fine", nothing to get too excited over. The buffalo ranch, though, might be the worse chip I've ever had. I can't remember the last time I didn't finish off a small bag of chips. Speaking of which, the contents of these bags seems pretty small. I know the weight listed, but when you open it up it's like 1/4th of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The flavors in the variety pack used to be better. Make the bbq boxes cheaper.
customer_reviews.text: There used to be salted chips in the variety packs. And the buffalo is new. I like the flavor of the buffalo but its too spicy for normal snacking. Im not huge on the cheese flavor. What that means is, the bbq is the only good one. But, the bbq only boxes are over twice as much, so wtf. Was subscribed but cancelling.
customer_reviews.author: item

customer_reviews.title: Received the wrong chips
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed I ordered the variety pack of the bold and crunchy, expecting tangy barbecue, cheddar, sour cream and buffalo ranch. Instead I received the regular pop chips. ***** Update I received the correct chips after the above review. I am a fan of these chips as they are packed with flavor. The only down side is the bag is 70% air and 30% chips. Wish there were more!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Definitely got my BBQ fix
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly, these chips are amazingly good. Just 100 calories, no oil used, and still these are jam-packed with flavor. If you want your BBQ fix while staying healthy, you can get a box of these or the regular popped BBQ. Stay away from the sour cream & onion flavor though. Where these BBQ are masterclass, they might be one bit of lighting caught in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Larrity

customer_reviews.title: Good low calorie and bold tast
customer_reviews.text: These chips tasted great and I'm not a huge fan of Buffalo Sauce either. Cheddar and sour cream could be a bit holder. Tangy BBQ is just about perfect. The experation date was reasonable. I have ordered other brands and they expire in a week. For price, quality, quantity and flavor you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Laroy Antoine Turner

customer_reviews.title: Open box Missing Chips
customer_reviews.text: Purchased box of 72. This is how it arrived. Wide open, tape ripped and there were only 20 packs.
customer_reviews.author: Alison W

customer_reviews.title: Texture is weird.
customer_reviews.text: Eh’ not very good the texture is strange for a chip. Love the bbq flavor not so mich the rest. Couldn't stomach through a bag of the cheddar - what kind of fake cheddar is that? The chicken wing taste like a wing but who wants to eat that
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite chip
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly as advertised, however I am. Not super fond of the flavor of the actual chip, or I guess it's the aftertaste.. anyways, not my favorite. But the chip it's self is good and crispy... To each their own.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to regular, greasy potato chips!
customer_reviews.text: Potato chips are my guilty pleasure, and I must have tried a thousand “better-for-you” options... that being said, I think PopChips are my absolute favorite! I love the texture of the ridged popchips, and the flavors are great! Love the original, BBQ, and Buffalo Ranch the most. #yum
customer_reviews.author: Abigail H

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the chips?!
customer_reviews.text: I have come to realize these are only 100 cal because you only get 1/4 of a bag full. But the flavor is good, so there's that. 3 stars for the flavor, -2 stars because of the small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Blair&Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors but eat quickly...
customer_reviews.text: Buffalo ranch is my absolute fave!!! Please be warned that many of the perishables that are on sale through amazon often are close to the expiration date. These usually are no exception. But they’re great while they last!
customer_reviews.author: Pegasus

customer_reviews.title: Potato chips done differently!
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty good, not many per bag...but at 100 calories per bag a tasty treat. Bought them to take on a road trip and really liked the ease of opening the bag, they have a little "snip" at the top, grab and pull down, OPENED!! I would recommend these as a good calorie controlled tasty snack.
customer_reviews.author: CJS

customer_reviews.title: STALE! Save your money!!! DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I initially wasn't going to write a review but after having a friend of mine eat the chips and have the same feeling as me I must speak up. THESE CAME STALE SAVE YOUR MONEY! This is ridiculous and plain wrong. I wish I hadn't bought them almost a month ago because I truly want my money back. DO NOT BUY! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Emmanuel Childs

customer_reviews.title: Fresh crunchy and bold.
customer_reviews.text: Very bold flavors. Crunchy and crisp. I know during shipping some food items are crushed. These were intact. I’ve only tried the Cheddar & Sour cream so far and only 100 calories per bag. Which for me, is a good thing, because I’m a snack-o-holic.
customer_reviews.author: Sxypddy

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The flavor was okay and the packaging was aesthetically pleasing but was not satisfactory for keeping chips from being crushed. As you can see in the picture, all but 3 chips were crushed. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KKT

customer_reviews.title: Both boxes were super stale
customer_reviews.text: I love popchips but these were super stale, even though they hadn't met their expiration date. I mentioned as much and tried to return, to Amazon credit they sent me another box for free, however they were super stale as well. Now I have ~35 bags of stale popchips. Not going to try ordering again. Disappointed because popchips are normally great.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived just at lunch, so I opened the box, pulled a bag out without looking at all the contents. Opened the bag which was BBQ flavor. After taking a bite I realized these were not ridged chips. Then I went back to examine the open package to find that all 24 bags are identical. No ridges and only BBQ. Since I'd eaten one bag I guess I can't return the box, but I am definitely disappointed that I didn't get what I ordered. Wish I had unpacked the box before eating one of them so I could have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Not much in bags. Too bold for me.
customer_reviews.text: I love the other popchips but this one was not a winner for me. I was very surprised when I opened the first bag to discover very few chips. The flavor is also too bold for me but tastes good. Will stick with the other popchips!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: These are good tasting but I personally prefer the regular popchips over the ridged popchips. The order was received fast and the price was great. Nothing wrong with them, just my personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little chips
customer_reviews.text: These right here are amazing I think and my family love them to it is a great deal the only bad thing is the individual bags do not have very many chips in them but other then that these are amazing
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Yummy chips, not terrible price
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good. I dont think the price is bad but the bags are maaaaybe 1/3 the way full. I could probably eat like 4 bags at once lol. Good buy for on the go or to have a kids soccer games for the healthier option definitely.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Good size for snack
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like all 3 varieties, the tangy bbq taste very yummy, the buffalo wing sauce is strong, the cheese is the leaest favor for me, the seasoning is not that tasty like nacho cheese Doritos
customer_reviews.author: LCY

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: Not expired but not fresh or crispy. Very flavored, too much actually. When I first tried the original ones long ago they were crunchy and very good even if no special flavor. Disappointed hopefully it's just this batch but wasted money. I've never not finished a small bag of chips.
customer_reviews.author: Mlwe7

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Flavor was just so so can't say they tasted that good, bordering stale ... the worst thing was the quantity in each pack. There were barely a few chips in each bag. I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Turbo97se

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had a half a bag and gave the box away just a terrible taste i tryed to give them a chance and when the kids tried them they ran away so i new it was bad my kids love snacks but not these
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great flavors, size and price!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, specially the BBQ flavor! The only one that I really disliked and gave away is the chili one. Not even my partner who will eat stuff just to avoid throwing food away could finish one bag. Thankfully, the box only contained about 3-4 of this flavor. The size of the bag is convenient to pair with a sandwich/wrap for lunch or just as a quick snack.
customer_reviews.author: IleeC

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as original Popchips
customer_reviews.text: Taste is pretty good, but the texture isn't to my liking. The original Popchips are light and crisp. These are denser, and although they are crunchy, I would say they also are "tough" in texture. Not a snappy, chippy crunch, but something that feels a bit like work to chew.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not ALL Buffalo Ranch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these chips after someone introduced me to them. I thought the whole pack was just the Buffalo Ranch but it was an equal amount of Buffalo Ranch, Tangy BBQ and Cheddar and Sour Cream. They are all yummy, but these Buffalo Ranch ones are AMAZING! the PERFECT ratio of Buffalo and Ranch!
customer_reviews.author: SacMama

customer_reviews.title: Very spicy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the buffalo ranch thinking they would be similar to the bbq; they are much spicier!! After eating a bag I needed lots of water. They taste good, but definitely have a big kick.
customer_reviews.author: Laww89

customer_reviews.title: wrong flavor
customer_reviews.text: Hello, i ordered this product because i LOVED the ridges and 3 different variety of flavored chips. ive ordered this before and never had an issue. THIS time, i was dupped :( i received the REGULAR pop chips box with ONLY the barbeque flavor. it was upsetting because my family and 2 year old were really looking forward to have the other 3 flavors as promised. i pack them their lunches, for husbands work and toddlers daycare. i hope the seller will either refund my money or send me what i am truly supposed to get.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like regular pop chips but these take the flavor to a whole new level!! I like all three flavors and i'm not a big buffalo person. You can't beat the price! I also think the single bags keep you accountable to one serving. This are now a staple in my cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: Kamdenr9

customer_reviews.title: yes, less fat!
customer_reviews.text: It is definitely less fat because its mostly air in these bags. You get maybe 6-7 "chips" per bag. The "cheddar" ones are disgusting fake powder taste. The BBQ ones are decent. I will not be buying these again in any form.
customer_reviews.author: 19Laurie73

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good at first
customer_reviews.text: Reverse acquired taste—-we really liked these at first. Good crunch, variety of flavors. About halfway through the box, we all tired of them and felt the chips had a bit of a processed after taste. They were fresh; just personal taste.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good When It Lasts.
customer_reviews.text: When I received it, it was great. About a month and half later, it had a chemical smell. I had to throw out the rest. I thought it would have been great for a few months at least.
customer_reviews.author: Bimmerfest80

customer_reviews.title: One of my family's favorite chips!
customer_reviews.text: We like the Popchips so much we finished these in a few days. We were just wondering why some of the bags were quite flat compared to others. But I really think the price was quite reasonable. I most probably be buying again soon.
customer_reviews.author: MariaM

customer_reviews.title: Weird texture
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these chips but the texture was just awful. Every bag tasted stale and I couldn't get anyone else in my household to eat them. I'm disappointed because the flavors are good but the texture is just too weird. I love the regular kind of Popchips but these are a total flop.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: The Buffalo Ranch flavour are HOT and SPICY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, these are nice. They’re a cross between rice cakes and chips. I would like to add though, that the Buffalo Ranch flavour are HOT, and for the most part are NOT kid-friendly.
customer_reviews.author: sjlcnm

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: Two out of three of the flavors are totally stale. I’ve bought these at the grocery...totally different experience. Too bad because the snack size is hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: California Faye

customer_reviews.title: I kinda already knew I liked the bbq flavored pop chips
customer_reviews.text: I kinda already knew I liked the bbq flavored pop chips. I had reservations about the Chilli cheese, but I think it’s starting to grow on me. The other flavor (sea salt) wasn’t anything spectacular but I wasn’t expecting it to be. The sour cream was the same. Honestly, if they had a box that had just BBQ I would love it. But I guess variety makes you appreciate the BBQ more hah!
customer_reviews.author: mozartianme

customer_reviews.title: Yuuuuccckkkk
customer_reviews.text: These were horrible! The original pop chips were so good but these are just terrible. Yuck. I don’t even think I am eating the rest of these. Such a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best flavor ever
customer_reviews.text: We had these first at a indoor climbing place. My kids and I have been searching grocery stores for this flavor and couldn't find them so I finally ordered online. I had some happy kids when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: GotAmazon?

customer_reviews.title: Great for guests!
customer_reviews.text: We have people coming over all the time and they make for good snacks they can grab a bag and I don’t have to worry about stale, left over chips. Great flavors! Something for everyone!
customer_reviews.author: NPi

customer_reviews.title: Can't eat these. :(
customer_reviews.text: Some of the chips in each individual bag are really stale tasting. I might be able to overcome that if the flavor was awesome. But it's not. None of the 3 flavors are very good. Sorry, pop chips.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Bag full of air with crumbs.
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious- I love these chips soo much. But I feel like their called pops because of the sound the bag makes when you open it and let out a bag full of air that only has maybe 8 chips in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: kristen stephens

customer_reviews.title: Bbq flavor is great.
customer_reviews.text: After trying popchips i thought to try the ridges one, i liked the bbq flavor but the buffalo and cheddar was okay. Overall it was fresh, few packs had some crumbled chips in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sareeha Muneer

customer_reviews.title: It burns the inside of my mouth
customer_reviews.text: I recently went to my dentist for a teeth cleaning and he noticed a lot of burning on my top of the inside of my mouth and I attributed to the ingredients to these potato chips because I’m sitting here now at the couch eating a bag of these chips and the top of my mouth is irritated when it was not earlier today. I don’t know what to say. But I have had many potato chips before and I’ve never had a burning like this before.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Expiration date not far behind
customer_reviews.text: Low cal pop chips. Same ones you can buy locally. Just be warned when these are on sale for a buck or two less there’s a good chance the expiration date is not far behind.
customer_reviews.author: S. Truong

customer_reviews.title: They are gluten free and a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Great snacks calories already counted. And they are gluten free! I have Celiac Disease it is a necessity to eat gluten free. Snacks are always a challenge. This had three choices, including barbeque which is indeed, rare. They taste great at an unbelievable price.
customer_reviews.author: Mardell

customer_reviews.title: Box is misleading
customer_reviews.text: Havent tried the chips yet but the packaging isnt like the picture. The picture makes it like u have clean cut box for storage in a cabinet. This box is just a packing box. Chips are pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly as pictured
customer_reviews.text: This is not a box of evenly split flavors, instead the majority are plain and BBQ with only a few of the other two types. It looks like it was opened and random numbers were put in. Very odd. As to quality, the one bag I have eaten so far is well within date, and tastes good.
customer_reviews.author: Gilly

customer_reviews.title: Not  enough quantity too light
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good.but there are not good for quantity.a bag only has about 12-8 pieces of chips and uh-huh so you could try but wouldn't but won'tbe good if u eat emwhile watching a movie and too expensive

customer_reviews.title: Not a good taste nor a good texture
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, these were the most disgusting chips ever. I have bought the regular Popchips before, which the whole family enjoyed. These however are caked with powdered flavor. If the flavor was tasty, maybe the excess powder would be acceptable... Unfortunately, all 3 flavors were nasty. customer_reviews.title: Will buy again

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I’m a huge fan of cheese, it’s my biggest obsession! Therefore, I was excited to receive the product but disappointed in the taste. The cheese flavored chips were extremely strong, it tasted like blue cheese and smelt like stinky cheese. As for the buffalo ranch, it was extremely spicy but tasted true to its marketing. All 3 chips were a lot crunchier than the bundle including bbq, sea salt, and sour cream which had me taken aback, but the chips are worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: Resolved - False Advertising, Does not give you 24 of your requested flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely ridiculous. I've ordered this a few times and every time I'm only given one third of the box in the flavor I've requested. And this time around I was given a box with every flavor except the one I requested. If I could give this zero stars I would, I'm fed up with this blatant false advertising! EDIT: received a replacement box full of the flavor I ordered so I'm editing this review to reflect this. Thank you!

customer_reviews.title: Small bags: not that good
customer_reviews.text: I see that other people had similar experiences as me-- the big bags of Pop Chips are great! These small bags, not so much. I think the chips are fresh, but many in the bag have a stale consistency to them. They're not as "popped" as they should be, so they don't have the delicate crispiness that you would expect. Avoid this box of small bags.
